name: MONOCHROME (RamenNoodles031)
description:
Hi, I am only 14 and this is my second game jam so the game probably sucks. I hope that you will play it still and hopefully enjoy it.

You control both characters at the same time and have to jump on platforms so that both characters can reach each other. You can't see the platforms until you stand on a button but once you step off then you can't see them  again. You will have to memorize the platform and spike locations. There are also switches which activate different things.

Controls:

A and D to move left and right.

W to jump.

S while standing on top of a switch to interact with it.

ESC to pause the game.
